channel.title: Chuck Tingle, The Tingleverse Episode - Full Metal RPG
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
My name is Brendan and I host a roleplaying game discussion podcast called Full Metal RPG.
I love to follow the work of Chuck Tingle, and so when he released "The Tingleverse" RPG I was an early adopter. My friend Richard who is also a member of the Gauntlet community and co-host of the show encouraged me to reach out to Chuck and invite him on the show to talk about the game.
I did just that, and I'm so happy how it turned out! I guess that's the power of asking! Chuck came on and talked about the game and how Love is Real. I hope that you will take a second and listen to the episode, I have it linked for you below. Thanks for reading!
https://soundcloud.com/full-metal-rpg/bonus-episode-032-chuck-tingle-the-tingleverse-the-official-chuck-tingle-roleplaying-game

item.title: Chuck Tingle, The Tingleverse Episode - Full Metal RPG

item.description:
@Bohnhoff wrote:

This is definitely the most fun podcast interview I’ve ever listened to.

Read full topic
